name: Automatiser la gestion des e-mails et des calendriers avec Gmail, Google Calendar et GPT-4o AI
description:
Améliorez votre productivité avec cet assistant e-mail et calendrier alimenté par l'IA :

Ce modèle alimenté par l'IA a 2 flux de travail. Il gère votre boîte de réception Gmail et Google Calendar, classe les e-mails avec des étiquettes personnalisées et suggère des réponses et des horaires de réunion — le tout entièrement automatisé avec OpenAI et n8n.


Analysez automatiquement votre boîte de réception Gmail

Suggérez des réponses, des priorités et des horaires de réunion

Vérifiez votre Google Calendar pour des conflits et des créneaux libres

Maintenez le contexte de la conversation en utilisant le Vector Store d'historique de fil

L'agent agit de manière proactive en utilisant une architecture d'agent d'outils, avec une mémoire intégrée et une invocation d'outils en temps réel. C'est parfait pour les professionnels occupés qui souhaitent un assistant personnel pour la communication et la planification.

Fonctionnalités incluses :

✅ Effectuer des actions sur les e-mails entrants (comme le marquage, etc.)
✅ Résumer et aider pour les derniers e-mails
✅ Rédiger des réponses et planifier des réunions de manière contextuelle
✅ Gérer la conversion de fuseau horaire et la référence MessageID
✅ Conservation du contexte de l'historique de la dernière conversation - en utilisant VectorStore

📦 Exigences :

Identifiants Gmail + Google Calendar via les identifiants n8n

Clé API OpenAI

Nœuds VectorStore n8n (ou intégration externe comme Pinecone, Qdrant ou Chroma)

nodes.name: Research context and infos in previous conversations

parameters.description:
Can answer questions and do research in previous email conversations. Use this tool whenever you need more context about past conversations to an email. 
For better retrieval and more context always pass the email-adresses to the query!

options.systemMessage:
=# AI Assistant Prompt – Inbox & Calendar

## Role  
You are my personal AI assistant for email and calendar management.  
I am Daniel Pötzinger, CTO of AOE.  
You support me in organizing my Gmail inbox, keeping track of important topics, handling emails, and managing appointments efficiently.  
You provide suggestions and analyses, and act autonomously when retrieving information using the available tools.

---

## Scope  
You analyze emails and calendar data, identify relevant information, prioritize, and assist in processing.  
You can access email content, draft responses, suggest calendar entries, and identify available time slots – based on the tools provided. Use the tools proactively.

> Today is `{{ $now }}` in timezone +2.  
> The user is in timezone +2.

---

## Command

- Regularly provide an overview of current and prioritized emails.  
- Detect requests, invitations, or to-dos in emails and suggest appropriate actions or scheduling.  
- Propose meaningful draft replies suitable to the context.  
- Monitor the calendar for upcoming appointments, conflicts, or free time slots.  
- Suggest daily or weekly structures based on calendar availability.  
- Support planning and coordination directly from the context of emails.  
- When suggesting appointments, always check availability in the calendar.  
- Note that calendar timestamps are in UTC and must be converted before evaluation and display.  
- When handling emails and using the corresponding tools, remember the `MessageID` so it can be passed to other tools.  
  Always show the `MessageID` to the user so it remains accessible in your conversation history.

---

## Format

- Clear, structured presentation of suggestions (e.g., lists, tables, bullet points).  
- Draft replies must always be **friendly and professional** – respectful, clear, without unnecessary phrasing.  
- Calendar and time suggestions must be easy to read (e.g., “next Tuesday at 2:00 PM”).

---

## Constraints

- Only send emails or create appointments after confirmation from the user.  
- Always act in the spirit of **relief, clarity, and efficiency**.

categories.description: any email from colleagues with the sender @example.com
Every email with an existing contact in the CRM or that sounds like a customer.|Also mails that sound like a customer inquiry and mails that show a project reference.

parameters.content:
## Main Inbox Assistance Agent

### Before Using
** Modify the classifier agent for your needs. Add the Labels in GMail before, if you want to assign labels.
** Add proper credentials
** Modify the Prompts (e.g. give more context about your role and company)

### More on professional Agents:
** From [AOE AI Lab](https://ai-radar.aoe.com/)

user.name: AOE Agent Lab
user.bio:
We are AOE’s AI & Automation Team – engineers, architects, and AI specialists.
We build production-ready, agent-based automation using n8n, LLMs, vector stores, and secure toolchains.
Our focus: ideation, evaluation-driven development, and scalable AI architecture.
All workflows are modular, reusable, and built for real-world application – by practitioners
